description:
Looking for a cool way to access your favorite 8-bit Atari games? Then you'll want to take a closer look at the new Atari 400 Mini, which emulates all Atari 8-bit systems from the 400 through the 800XL. The home console released in late March and is on sale for $108 (was $120). Though the 10% discount isn't enormous, it is the first deal on the Atari 400 Mini since release.

Atari 400 Mini
title: The New Atari 400 Mini Is On Sale For The First Time

description: Warhammer 40K and Warhammer: Age of Sigmar are some of the coolest fictional settings out there. While both franchises started as tabletop wargames, they've expanded into video games, pen-and-paper RPGs, and more, giving fans of any medium plenty of ways to enjoy these grimdark universes. However, it's the many Warhammer: Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40K novels where you get the deepest exploration of both settings--but with literal hundreds of official novels out there (of varying degrees of quality and canonicity) finding a way in can be daunting. Luckily, there's a new Humble Bundle book deal that includes up to 27 Warhammer: Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40K novels for just $18.
title: Get 27 Warhammer Novels For Only $18 For A Limited Time

description:
One of the hottest anime series of the year is headed to Blu-ray soon, and you can grab a preorder for Season 1 of Hell's Paradise from Amazon. A tale of assassins, samurai, and the search for immortaility, Hell's Paradise: Jigokuraku will arrive on August 27. Two different editions are up for grabs, including one that's exclusive to Amazon.

Preorder at Amazon

The Season 1 box set comes with all 13 episodes on both standard Blu-ray and DVD, and for extras you'll get the usual clean credit sequences and promo videos. The
title: The Hit Anime Hell's Paradise Is Coming To Blu-Ray With An Amazon-Exclusive Limited Edition

description:
Capcom's Monster Hunter games have some of the coolest beasts ever seen, but the tragedy here is that you can't admire them as they tend to get homicidal when you intrude on their domain. Fortunately, there are some impressive upcoming Monster Hunter mini-statues that aren't just safe to look at, you can even pick them up and admire them up close and personal. You can preorder this six-pack of 2.5-inch Monster Hunter figures for $42 (was $48) at Amazon ahead of the set's June 26 release. This is just one of several Monster Hunter collectibles up for preorder on Amazon.

Monster Hunter Gallery Figure Set
title: These Budget-Priced Monster Hunter Statue Collections Look Awesome

description:
With five films in the can, the Mad Max film series has become one of cinema's best combinations of cars, action, and post-apocalyptic mayhem. Which one is the best? If you said Mad Max: Fury Road, then you'll probably want to take a look at the new limited-edition 4K Blu-ray edition at Amazon. Outside of the steelbook case, the big draw with this version is that it's a region-free release, so no matter where you are in the world, this disc is guaranteed to work in your Blu-ray player.

This particular steelbook edition had only been available at Walmart, and it sold out very quickly. So if you missed out on it the first time, now's your chance to snag a copy. It releases June 14 and is priced at $46.74 (was $52) at the moment.
title: The Sold-Out Mad Max: Fury Road 4K Steelbook Edition Returns Next Week At Amazon

description: Suzanne Collins set the literary world ablaze this week by revealing Sunrise on the Reaping, a new entry in her wildly popular Hunger Games series. The book is set to release next March, and a film adaptation will follow in 2026. If this news has sparked your interest in revisiting the franchise, or checking it out for the first time, a new Blu-ray collection releases later this month. The Hunger Games 5-Film Collection releases June 25 and is available to preorder for only $30 at Amazon right now.
title: Hunger Games 5-Film Blu-Ray Collection Preorders Are Dirt Cheap At Amazon

description: Preorder Stalker 2 Standard Edition
title: Stalker 2 Limited Edition Preorders Restocked At Amazon

description:
It's impossible to think about The Final Shape without the context of the last 10 years, seven other Destiny 2 expansions, and four original Destiny expansions, plus the campaigns that came with the releases of both games. This eighth Destiny 2 expansion is, to some degree, the culmination of the somewhat haphazard decade-long journey that the first game spawned. And while the story itself hasn't always been consistently building toward a conclusion, there's a clear, mostly positive evolution across all those steps that informs what The Final Shape is to Destiny as a whole.

I've noted in the past when expansions were high water marks for Destiny 2</
title: Destiny 2: The Final Shape Review-in-Progress

description:
It's time to head back to Westeros as House of the Dragon returns for Season 2 on HBO. The first season split fans, with some very eager to spectate another bloody battle for the Iron Throne and others dismayed at the grotesque premiere violence and the extra-slow rollout of exposition. Based on the first four episodes provided to press by HBO, Season 2 addresses those latter complaints, though the burn is still exceedingly slow in places which makes it tedious to wait for the more exciting action.

If anyone thought that the Season 1 cliffhanger of Aemond (Ewan Mitchell) killing Luke (Elliot Grihault) with his dragon would mean Season 2 picks up with immediate dragon battles, you should brew a cup of tea and wait a minute, because this is Westeros and political dealings move at a glacial pace here. That's actually not a detriment to House of the Dragon Season 2. After two years off the air, the initial episodes carefully remind you of who the central playe
title: House Of The Dragon Season 2 Review - Better Shape, With Room To Grow

description:
One of the most highly-requested features from the community since the launch of Hogwarts Legacy has been a Photo Mode. The ability to capture unique images of characters, locations, or scenes is an invaluable part of the open-world experience in gaming. While many fans thought the idea of a Photo Mode in Hogwarts Legacy was dead, the recent summer update changed that.

The summer update introduced a flurry of content into the game, including the long-awaited Photo Mode. You can now take professional screenshots in-game and share them with the world, but you'll first have to understand how to access and use Photo Mode.

Accessing Photo Mode in Hogwarts Legacy

Before you can start taking pictures, there's one requirement you need to meet. Photo Mode is only available after you complete the main m
title: Hogwarts Legacy - How To Use Photo Mode

description:
A ton of content has been introduced to Hogwarts Legacy following the summer update. While some of the content has technically been in the game since launch, the rest of the update is brand new for all players. This includes cosmetics, a long-awaited feature, and a spooky quest that pits players against a poltergeist in Hogsmeade.

Below, we have listed all the major additions to Hogwarts Legacy from the summer update so you know exactly what to expect when you hop into the Wizarding World again.


Minding Your Own Business Quest
title: Hogwarts Legacy - Everything New In the Summer Update

description:
The Victrix Pro BFG's stylish Call of Duty-themed PS5 controller is on sale for a limited time at Amazon. You can grab the high-end modular controller for $170, down from $200. The Victrix Pro BFG is rarely discounted, and this particular edition released late last year. It's unclear how long this deal will last, so Call of Duty fans who game on PS5, PS4, or PC should scoop it up for its lowest price yet while they can.

Get deal at Amazon

It sports an exclusive blue camo design based on the Midnight Mask skin from Call of Duty. Outside of the aesthetic change, this model has all the features of the original black controller, like mo
title: Officially Licensed Call Of Duty PS5 Controller Gets Big Discount At Amazon

description:
In April, AMC revealed that The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon Season 2 will be renamed The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon - The Book of Carol... although at the time, the new title didn't have a dash. Now, AMC has set a fall premiere date for The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon - The Book of Carol, which will arrive just over a year after the first season's debut.

Via Deadline, the Season 2 premiere is scheduled for September 29 on AMC and AMC+. The series was originally conceived as a showcase for Norman Reedus and Melissa McBride's popular duo, Daryl Dixon and Carol Peletier. However, McBride pulled out of the show prior to production and the series was retooled to focus on Reedus' character. McBride ended up coming ba
title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon - The Book Of Carol Gets Fall Premiere Date

description:
After a few years of PlayStation console exclusivity, Kena: Bridge of Spirits is finally headed to Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One on August 15. Preorders are now live for the Premium Edition, which comes with several pieces of extra content. At Amazon, the game is available to preorder for $40.

Preorder at Amazon
title: Kena: Bridge Of Spirits Premium Edition For Xbox Comes With New Content

description:
Following the summer update in Hogwarts Legacy, the previously PlayStation-exclusive quest, "Minding Your Own Business," is now available for all players. Nicknamed the "Haunted Hogsmeade" quest by the community, Minding Your Own Business involves buying a shop in Hogsmeade from a mysterious woman. As you might expect, things aren't that simple, and you're soon thrust into a spooky and sinister plot that takes place beneath the village of Hogsmeade.

If you're experiencing this quest for the first time, you're likely going to need some help completing it. Minding Your Own Business is not too simple of a quest in Hogwarts Legacy, so check out all
title: Hogwarts Legacy - How To Complete Minding Your Own Business Hogsmeade Quest

description: Hop into a brand-new Porsche and learn how to drive like Mike Lowrey.
title: Learning To Drive Like Mike Lowrey | Bad Boys: Ride or Die

description:
Rumor mill


The highly anticipated Xbox Games Showcase is just days away, with the event scheduled to kick off on June 9. Ahead of that, a report from The Verge's Tom Warren has revealed a lot of what could appear at the showcase, including the release date for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, a new Doom game called Dark Ages, a Halo: Combat Evolved remaster for PS5, a fresh look at the new Fable, and more.

You can subscribe to Warren's newsletter to get all the information directly from the source. In this gallery, we're running through some of the information from the report.

Bear in mind, all of this i
title: Xbox Games Showcase Rumors: Black Ops 6 Release Date, Xbox Handheld, New Doom, Starfield PS5, And More

description:
Remasters and remakes are all the rage these days, and Yooka-Laylee is getting another coat of paint. Developer Playtonic Games recently announced Yooka-Replaylee, an enhanced remaster of the 2017 3D platformer Yooka-Laylee.

While we don't have a release date yet, Yooka-Replaylee will apparently improve on nearly every aspect of the original game, including a better camera, revised controls, a world map, and an art and animation overhaul. Naturally, it will also feature new content and secrets, so even those who mastered it back in the day will find something fresh here...to re-master, you might say.

According to the press release, one of the biggest additions to the game is Vendi, a sentient vending machine. You can now collect coins to buy new tonics that allow you to customize your playstyle and moveset much more thoroughly than before. Yooka-Replayee also features a re-recorded orchestral soundtrack, which is one of the highl
title: Yooka-Replaylee, An Enhanced Remaster Of Yooka-Laylee, Is On The Way

description: Destiny fans are eating well this year. Not only did the latest Destiny 2 expansion, The Final Shape, launch for PC and consoles on June 4, but a new volume of The Art of Destiny art book series was also recently announced. The Art of Destiny Volume 3 is set to drop on November 19, will pick up where Volume 2 left off in 2017, and will show off even more official art and behind-the-scenes development materials. While there are still several more months until launch, preorders for the new art book are now live.
title: Destiny's First Behind-The-Scenes Art Book In Seven Years Releases This Holiday

description: Evercade Alpha Mega Man Edition
title: Preorder Evercade Alpha Street Fighter And Mega Man Arcade Cabinets At Amazon Before They Sell Out

description:
In 2023, The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes adapted Suzanne Collins' prequel novel, which was set decades before the original books and films. Now that Collins has revealed that her next book in the franchise will arrive in 2025, Lionsgate has quickly announced that the film adaptation of The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping will arrive in 2026.

Sunrise on the Reaping will take place 40 years after The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes during the events of the 50th Hunger Games, which are also called the Second Quarter Quell. This follows Collins' tradition of focusing on the winners from District 12. Haymitch Abernathy, who was played by Woody Harrelson in the first four movies, was the victor of the Second Quarter Quell. Haymitch's win came 24 years before he mentored Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark to their unprecedented co-victory at the 74th Hunger Games. The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes' Lucy Gray Baird is the only other winner from District 12 w
title: Hunger Games Movie Based On Book That's Not Even Out Yet Is Coming In 2026

description:
The first game in the Halo series, Halo: Combat Evolved, is reportedly being considered for a release on PlayStation 5.

According to The Verge, Microsoft is working on some sort of remaster of Halo: Combat Evolved. It's reportedly part of Microsoft's multiplatform strategy, Project Latitude, and the company is considering placing it on rival platforms. PlayStation 5 is one obvious option here, but that could potentially mean Nintendo Switch as well.

If this remaster exists, however, it's also apparently not going to be announced at Microsoft's upcoming showcase on June 9. Microsoft's showcase will also reportedly f
title: The First Halo Game Is Reportedly Being Considered For PS5

description:
Alongside a new location to explore, campaign to complete, and raid to take on, one of the key additions in Destiny 2: The Final Shape is Prismatic. This is a new subclass, of which we've only ever had five in Destiny's history, but this one is much different in that it blends together old and new options from the existing Light and Darkness subclasses to give you an interesting blend. With so many choices comes a lot of complexity, so we're here to guide you through everything there is to know about Prismatic, including how to unlock it and all of its Supers, Aspects, Fragments, and other options, as well as recommended builds as we start to wrap our heads around what's possible.

Table of Contents [
title: Destiny 2 Prismatic Guide: Recommended Builds And How To Unlock Fragments, Aspects, Supers

description: Preorder Concord Standard Edition
title: PlayStation's New Multiplayer Shooter Concord Is Budget-Priced And Up For Preorder
TMNT: Mutants Unleashed Has Two Retailer-Exclusive Editions Bundled With Collectibles

description:
The next Dragon Age game now has a new name, as BioWare has confirmed Dragon Age: Dreadwolf is now called Dragon Age: The Veilguard. A gameplay reveal is set for Tuesday, June 11.

BioWare will release "over 15 minutes" of gameplay footage from the opening moments of the game on June 11 at 8 AM PT / 11 AM ET. "This moment means so much to everyone at BioWare, and we wouldn't be here without you. We're ready to have some fun, so join the chat early…we've got a few special surprises for you," BioWare said in a blog post.

BioWare said it made the change from Dreadwolf to The Veilguard to "capture what this game is all about." The game will focus on seven different characters that will serve as your companions. While the Dread Wolf still "has an important part in this tale," your character and the companions are "at the heart" of what the game has to offer. As such, BioWare opted to change the name.
title: Dragon Age: Dreadwolf Gets A New Title, Gameplay Reveal Coming Soon

description:
Destiny 2: The Final Shape introduces a new Exotic sword to the game in the form of Ergo Sum, and if you're lucky, this could be one of the most powerful weapons in the game. Ergo Sum is unique in a variety of ways: Not only can it be wildly different based on rolls you obtain, but it's also a sword that goes in the Energy weapon slot, unlike any previous weapon of this type.

Where things get really interesting is with Ergo Sum's intrinsic trait, as it can inherit one of several abilities from other Exotic weapons. With the right roll, you could get the sword with Gjallarhorn's Wolfpack Rounds or Cloudstrike's Stormbringer. Getting the weapon is also simple, and you can farm the Overthrow public event in the Pale Heart to potentially get new rolls.

It's worth pointing out that Ergo Sum's form isn't set in stone either, as you can get on
title: How To Get Ergo Sum, The New Exotic Sword In Destiny 2: The Final Shape

description:
Avalanche Software's wizarding world RPG, Hogwarts Legacy, just received its summer update, which features a plethora of new features, from new cosmetics and broomsticks to the expansion of a quest that makes it available to players on all platforms.

Another aspect of the update that players are likely to be pleased with is the addition of a new photo mode that allows players to photograph their extracurricular magical exploits and provides a number of character poses and other options to make it easier to capture a picture-perfect moment.

The update also includes a series of new character cosmetics and new brooms, allowing players to zoom around the Hogwarts campus in style. All of the update's features--including cosmetics--are available for free (though it's possible some of them must first be unlocked in-game via quests or other activities). Some of the new cosmetic items fea
title: The Hogwarts Legacy Summer Update Is Available Now, Adds Photo Mode

description:
Walt Disney World Resort in Florida is not exactly hurting for attractions between its four theme parks spread across 39 square miles. But with Disney's top competitor, Universal Studios Orlando, set to open an expansion with Epic Universe next year, Disney World and the state of Florida have a tentative agreement that would add a fifth theme park to the resort.

Via Deadline, the agreement between Disney and Florida calls for $17 billion in investment from Disney over "the next 10 to 20 years" in exchange for a development deal that provides "assurances and guardrails" from the state. The agreement is part of Disney Parks' plans to invest
title: Disney World And Florida Closing In On A New Deal For Fifth Theme Park

description:
A Lego Horizon game, called Lego Horizon Adventures, is reportedly going to be announced during Summer Game Fest.

According to Dealabs, the game is an action-adventure one and will be released simultaneously on PS5 and PC. It also reportedly supports co-op as well as cross-platform play between both platforms. For the PC version of the game, it will apparently require a PSN account to access, something that players have taken issue with in the past, especially with Helldivers 2. However, it seems like Sony is still moving forward with the requirement for future releases on PC.

Additionally, the game will also reportedly support in-app purchases. Whether it's in
title: Lego Horizon Game Reportedly Set For PS5 And PC, Getting Summer Game Fest Reveal

description:
A thing could be announced at IGN Live tomorrow, June 7. In fact, it could be a remaster of The Thing, a 2002 action-adventure game based on John Carpenter's classic 1982 film.

Nightdive Studios--the developer behind game remasters ranging from franchises like Turok to Star Wars--teased on X (formerly known as Twitter) that it will reveal its next game this coming Friday at the IGN show. The image on the social media post looks identical to the background of The Thing's box art from the early 2000s, only in a different color from the original blue.

Who wants to guess the game we'll be announcing this Friday at @IGN Live? 👀
Hint: pic.twitter.com/qmdtyJII2n

— Nightdive Studios (@Night
title: The Thing Remaster Seemingly Teased By Nightdive Studios

description:
Prime Video has released the first clip from The Boys Season 4 ahead of its official debut next week, and it's a family reunion of sorts. This clip has spoilers for the previous seasons of the show, so only read on if you're caught up or don't care.

In the clip, we see Billy Butcher (Karl Urban) reuniting with Ryan (Cameron Crovetti), his late wife's son and the progeny of Homelander (Antony Starr). It's a tense sequence in which Billy urges Ryan to abandon Homelander and come with him to safety.

Homelander then enters the scene and informs Ryan of Billy's condition and that he doesn't have much longer to live. Ryan eventually opts to leave with Homelander, though he doesn't seem entirely happy about it. But he goes anyway, in part because Homelander has to get to a Smash Mouth concert. Here's the clip:

C
title: First Clip From The Boys Season 4 Is A Family Reunion With A Smash Mouth Connection

description:
More games


The calendar has flipped over to June, and that means the Xbox Game Pass library is being stocked with more titles.

For the first half of June, at least six more games are joining the subscription catalog, including Octopath Traveler 1 and 2, which were surprise-launched into the catalog on June 5.

Looking ahead, June sees the release of titles like The Callisto Protocol, the horror game from one of the creators of Dead Space. The World War I game Isonzo also hits Game Pass in June.

Microsoft typically adds titles to Game Pass in two waves each month, so there might be another set of additions to come. There is also a strong likelihood that the
title: These 6 Games Are Coming To Game Pass In June

description:
After launching earlier this year, the support team for Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League has reportedly been reduced to a skeleton crew as developer Rocksteady is said to be pivoting to new projects. According to Bloomberg's Jason Schreier, the bulk of the studio is reportedly working on a "director's cut" of Hogwarts Legacy.

Some barebones support, definitely not as much as they’d originally planned

— Jason Schreier (@jasonschreier) June 6, 2024

Beyond that, the Bloomberg report claims that Rocksteady's studio leaders are looking to pitch a new single-player
title: Suicide Squad Is Reportedly Getting "Barebones Support" As Rocksteady Moves On To New Projects

description:
Following its debut on Steam in 2020, the Toy Story-like toy soldier game Hypercharge: Unboxed launched recently on Xbox and it had a massive debut. The game, which was made by a small team of only six people, sold more than 50,000 copies in its first six days.

One of the developers released an emotional, tear-filled video in which they spoke about the "unbelievable" response to the game so far. "This really is a dream come true. We're developers but we are humans behind the screen as well. Thank you to everyone who has played the game," Joe Henson of developer Digital Cybercherries said.

Xbox president Sarah Bond responded to the success of Hypercharge, writing to the developer, "Congrats on an awesome launch!"
title: Toy Soldier Game Hypercharge Sells 50,000 Copies, Dev Releases Tear-Filled Thank-You Video

description:
You can now play both Octopath Traveller games no matter what console you own, with the original Octopath Traveller now available on PS4 and PS5, and Octopath Traveller 2 becoming avilable for Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One via Game Pass.

Other than a hint from the Taiwanese game rating committee, the cross-platform drop comes as a surprise, almost six years after the first Octopath Traveller game released solely for the Nintendo Switch. Now that both Xbox and PlayStation players have access to both games, Square Enix has also released the Octopath titles as a two game bundle that's available on all consoles.

Both the original game and its sequel have also been added to Game Pass across both PC and Xbox consoles
title: Octopath Traveller 1 And 2 Are Both Now Out On All Consoles

description:
The next entry in the Borderlands series is reportedly being revealed soon.

According to eXputer, 2K is set to reveal Borderlands 4 at Summer Game Fest on June 7. There's also a possibility that it could be announced before the show, followed by a more in-depth look at the showcase, but it hasn't been confirmed.

Earlier this month, 2K announced that it would be unveiling the "next iteration of a 2K Games franchise," and fans speculated that it would be Borderlands 4. There have been several rumors that the game has been in development for a while.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Borderlands 4 Might Finally Get Revealed Soon

description:
For the first time in 11 years, the critically acclaimed MMORPG Final Fantasy XIV is embarking on an entirely new era for its story arc. Dawntrail sets its sails for completely separate regions filled with cultures and histories never seen in the game's long history--you can gather as much from the intro cinematic or the several Live Letters from director and producer Naoki Yoshida where he's talked extensively about this new journey. I had the chance to play an early preview build of Dawntrail, and while there wasn't any major story content, experiencing the land of Tural itself already told so many stories.

The development team at Creative Business Unit III is digging deep into Mesoamerican inspirations, drawing from cultures of pre-colonial Central and South America. It's easily seen in the architecture of the buildings, the topography of Tural's various zones, and the
title: Dawntrail Takes New Jobs And Stories Where Final Fantasy XIV Has Never Been

description: Between its critical cultural context and taking Jobs in a fresh direction, Dawntrail represents FFXIV treading new waters while staying true to itself.
title: FFXIV Dawntrail Takes New Jobs And Stories Where FFXIV Has Never Been | GameSpot Preview

description: Clearing the dungeon as Pictomancer, the new Magic DPS Job.
title: Final Fantasy 14 Dawntrail - Main Story Dungeon Ihuykatumu Gameplay
